005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.object.DateTime;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
011
012import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016public interface IDateTimeItem extends ITemporalItem {
017  /**
018   * Construct a new date/time item using the provided string {@code value}.
019   *
020   * @param value
021   *          a string representing a date/time
022   * @return the new item
023   */
024  @NonNull
025  static IDateTimeItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
026    try {
027      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_TIME.parse(value));
028    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
029      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(String.format("Unable to parse string value '%s'", value),
030          ex);
031    }
032  }
033
034  /**
035   * Construct a new date/time item using the provided {@code value}.
036   *
037   * @param value
038   *          a date/time, without time zone information
039   * @return the new item
040   */
041  @NonNull
042  static IDateTimeItem valueOf(@NonNull DateTime value) {
043    return new DateTimeWithoutTimeZoneItemImpl(value);
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Construct a new date/time item using the provided {@code value}.
048   *
049   * @param value
050   *          a date/time, with time zone information
051   * @return the new item
052   */
053  @NonNull
054  static IDateTimeItem valueOf(@NonNull ZonedDateTime value) {
055    return new DateTimeWithTimeZoneItemImpl(value);
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
060   *
061   * @param item
062   *          the item to cast
063   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
064   *         cast to this type
065   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
066   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
067   */
068  @NonNull
069  static IDateTimeItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
070    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.DATE_TIME.cast(item);
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  default IDateTimeItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
075    return cast(item);
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
080    return compareTo(cast(item));
081  }
082}
